mapper.delete: update user set is_deleted = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from `user` us where 1=1 and is_deleted != 1
and instr( us.username,#{username}) > 0
and instr( us.name,#{name}) > 0
and us.status = #{status}

select user.id,user.phone, login.token,login.updated_time as updatedTime from `login` left join `user` on user.id = login.user_id where 1 = 1
and login.token = #{token}
